message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a valuable asset that I believe will be of significant benefit to you. I understand its value to you, and I'm willing to negotiate a price that reflects its worth.  I'm proposing a price of $1,400,000. This price is fair and allows you to acquire the product at a substantial savings compared to its intrinsic value.  Please consider this offer carefully. I am confident that you will find this acquisition to be a wise investment.
